TABLE.NAME: block_course_audit_tours
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores references to tours created by the Course Audit block

FIELD.NAME: tourid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the tour in tool_usertours_tours table

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this tour belongs to

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp when the tour was created

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp when the tour was last modified

TABLE.NAME: block_course_audit_results
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores results of individual audit rule checks for a specific audit run (tour)

FIELD.NAME: auditid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the corresponding audit run in block_course_audit_tours

FIELD.NAME: rulekey
FIELD.COMMENT: Unique identifier for the audit rule checked

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: Outcome of the rule check (e.g., pass, fail, info)

FIELD.NAME: message
FIELD.COMMENT: Optional message or details about the result

FIELD.NAME: targettype
FIELD.COMMENT: Type of Moodle entity the rule targets (e.g., course, section, module)

FIELD.NAME: targetid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the Moodle entity the rule targets

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp when this result was recorded

INDEX.NAME: auditid_rulekey
INDEX.COMMENT: Ensure only one result per rule per audit
